rather, he turned back defeated, and marched back to the land of the Romans.and nothing could be done about the severity of the freezing cold and the shock of copious rainfall;And it was in the wintertime,and encamped at the gates of the city.And he went with a fearful multitude and innumerable troops against the city Dvin,appointed as general the great Roman prince whose name was Teliarch, being a castrated eunuch.Again in the year 495 of the Armenian era the Greek king Monomachos, assembling an army,
